Description:
Oversized, Resort-Style Luxury designed & built by Mirvac
Perfectly poised on the fringe of Chapel St, this securely-gated, modern, oversized two bedroom apartment offers a remarkable sense of sanctuary and sets the benchmark for inner-urban living. Adjacent to both Chapel St and Toorak Rd, this Mirvac built apartment is beautifully presented and combines its sizable proportions with a lap pool, gymnasium, sauna and spa.
